name: Where'smybus
0:
”alexa, open my bus”
”Alexa open my bus and add stop 15651”
”alexa open my bus and list my buses”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my bus
des:
Find out when the next MUNI is coming to your stop. 

To use it, first, add your favorite buses by saying 'Alexa open my bus and add stop 13205' (you can find your stop id at https://www.sfmta.com/getting-around/transit/routes-stops). 

If there is more than one bus stopping there, Alexa will ask you to specify the bus number. You can add more than one if you need to.

After that, say 'Alexa open my bus' and she'll tell you when your bus is coming. 

If you want to remove a bus say 'Alexa open my bus and remove bus 10'.

If you want to list your buses say 'Alexa open my bus and list my buses'

This skill uses the 511.org service to get the departure times, but it's not affiliated with it, SFMTA or Muni.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
